subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Manchester City’s Lampard sought on Friday to explain the confusion over his contract and reassure fans in New York that he will join the M.L.S. team in the summer.
snippet: Manchester City’s Lampard sought on Friday to explain the confusion over his contract and reassure fans in New York that he will join the M.L.S. team in the summer.
